This the homepage of the **Pteridophyte Phylogeny Group (PPG)**, a community of scientists who maintain a taxonomic classification of pteridophytes (ferns and lycophytes).

All discussion of taxonomic proposals is hosted publicly on [GitHub](https://github.com/pteridogroup/ppg/). For more information, please see the [Guide to GitHub for PPG](github.qmd).

## Participation

Anybody is welcome to participate. Please read [the project guidelines](guidelines.qmd) and [contact us](guidelines.qmd#coordinating-committee) for more information if you have any questions.
